attributes.action: Are fathers' csa payments being spent on the child's care?
attributes.additional_details: A father whose relationship ends, and is unemployed and on benefits, pays £5 a week to his ex through the csa, which his ex complains is not enough. He knows his ex was a smoker before she became pregnant, but gave up when she became pregnant, but has started again. WITH THE PRICE OF CIGARETTES, IS THIS FATHER ENTITLED TO BE ANGRY, WHEN HE CAN'T AFFORD THE THINGS THAT ARE HEALTHY FOR HIM, LET ALONE BAD AND UNHEALTHY HABITS?
